name: Chasing the Light (jangames, redcabrita, eugenialamistica)
description:
CONTROLS

W A S D to move

Press space to atune to energy sources

A game made for the Global Game Jam 2021

Theme Lost and found

Credits

Programming - Juan Rinaudo

2D Art - Jimena Vallejos (UI)

3D Art - Jimena Vallejos (Characters), Liz Márquez (Enviroment)

Game design - Juan Rinaudo, Jimena Vallejos, Liz Márquez

Music - Tuin Me IonTe by Di Bos

Sound FX - Gamemaster Audio - Pro Sound Collection v1.3 - 16bit 48k
